dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: A Resistance rank of [#1] and  mettle are required to proceed with this quest.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You are Resistance rank [#1], and have amassed  mettle.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: In order to undertake this quest, you must be a Disciple of War or Magic.

dialogue.name: WAKADANNAOFMUJIKOZA
dialogue.text: Now look here. My father was quite clear on the repercussions of returning to him without your next work.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: And for that you have my sympathies, but genius is a most fickle mistress, and her expertise was thoroughly spent but recently on a playscript promised to my dear friend Jenomis.

dialogue.name: WAKADANNAOFMUJIKOZA
dialogue.text: You honestly mean to say you have nothing? Not even an outline? I deserve that much after you were so generously compensated the other evening.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: Compensation...? That drink was meant to be payment for my services!?

dialogue.name: WAKADANNAOFMUJIKOZA
dialogue.text: Well it certainly wasn't offered out of the kindness of my heart. Have you any idea how expensive that wine was?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: As I recall, you and your wife were the ones who drank most of it. And you clearly have more money than sense, because that particular “vintage” was positively revolting.

dialogue.name: WAKADANNAOFMUJIKOZA
dialogue.text: And who might this be? Wait, don't tell me─another good friend come to rob me of your next playscript?

dialogue.name: WAKADANNAOFMUJIKOZA
dialogue.text: Forename Surname!? Champion of Eorzea, savior of Doma, that Forename Surname?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: Thus do I find myself wanting for inspiration. Have you, by chance, embarked on any fantastical journeys of late? Grand adventures to stir the soul and perhaps my writing hand to commit pen to paper?

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: The fabled blade Save the Queen given life, guarded by Gunnhildr's Blades... And you say this took place in the ruins of the Bozjan royal palace? My oh my, that is quite the riveting tale.

dialogue.name: WAKADANNAOFMUJIKOZA
dialogue.text: Aha, I know that look! You have an idea for your script.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: You are quite right, my friend. The seed of inspiration has been planted. SheHe stands in the royal palace─no, the royal cathedral! A suitably opulent location, at any rate. And the last descendant of Queen Gunnhildr stands ready to defy you in pursuit of her lifelong ambition!

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: “Why do you insist on standing in my way!?” she exclaimed, tightening her grip on the holy blade. “Are you truly so eager to meet your gods?”

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: “No! Any who would oppose me are undeserving of such a mercy! The only solace you shall have from my wrath will be damnation!”

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: ...No. No, I fear having not seen the exchange firsthand, my prose will stray too far into the realm of fiction.

dialogue.name: WANDERINGWRITER
dialogue.text: If I am to do your deeds justice, I must needs know all that took place that fateful day, down to the finest detail.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You can now participate in the duty Delubrum Reginae (Savage).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: An alliance of 24 to 48 players is required to register for this duty.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: The Party Finder may be used to recruit members for this duty by selecting Field Operations, then Delubrum Reginae (Savage).

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: After forming an alliance, the alliance leader must speak with the troubled gentleman in Gangos to register.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: While inside Delubrum Reginae (Savage), you will be subjected to a status effect that prevents resurrection by certain means.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Raise effects granted via limit breaks and certain lost actions are exempt from this restriction.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Without such means to recover in battle, due preparation will prove all the more essential in this encounter.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You may also speak with the troubled gentleman for further details before entering.
